snippet: If you’re looking for things to do this weekend, the Tribeca Film Festival is in full swing in lower Manhattan. There’s also the Ai Weiwei exhibition in Brooklyn and Olga Pereyatko makes her Met debut.
abstract: If you’re looking for things to do this weekend, the Tribeca Film Festival is in full swing in lower Manhattan. There’s also the Ai Weiwei exhibition in Brooklyn and Olga Pereyatko makes her Met debut.

headline.main: This Weekend: Indie Films and Ai Weiwei
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
